author: Lon.TV
description:
See more in this series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItSSUpA-DskfKKKrQ_LQYwP - A recent filing from the HC2 Broadcasting Holdings group asks the FCC to give low powered TV stations the option to use ATSC 3.0 or a new 5G TV technology that could work with mobile phones in the future. title: ATSC 3 vs. 5G TV Format War? Broadcast TV Group Wants a 5G ATSC 3.0 Alternative
